title: "We're unable to log you in because you may be offline" still broken.
body:
The so called "fix" mentioned in [Known Issue official thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Tb1fUZFV-known-issue-were-unable-to-log-you-in-because-you-may-be-offline?sort_type=recent) didn't fix anything. Client is still broken & can't be fixed with the work around mentioned in the thread. 
After deleting the "gameflow-patcher-lock:" line>saving file>closing. launching game automatically updates the file back with that line.

I tried making file read only & kept file open, tried changing null to true. none of this works. super annoying issue. 

This issue's been known for 4 days, put it in Server status since its obviously not fixed & people are still posting in that thread including me.

replies.body: It seems like a good amount of players hit some login issues around 12-18 hours ago. That known issue thread was for a different problem but we're looking into what might have happened. It seems like the login troubles have cleared up at this point, but definitely let me know if you still can't get signed in.
I am still having this problem.
same here been like this since late last night{{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xPElEdAH,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-06-18T23:04:48.850+0000)
>
> It seems like a good amount of players hit some login issues around 12-18 hours ago. That known issue thread was for a different problem but we're looking into what might have happened. It seems like the login troubles have cleared up at this point, but definitely let me know if you still can't get signed in.


The SECOND work around posted above worked for me.

I just posted another sticky with steps that might be able to help. I know some of them have been mentioned before, but give those a try and if they don't work our tech guys have another trick up their sleeve. It's a little more in depth, so reach out to them in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can guide you through the steps!

Go to C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc and open the file "hosts" in notepad Then delete
"23.74.24.114 l3cdn.riotgames.com" from the bottom.

This should fix it, i was changing this ip to another ip of Riot & never thought to simply delete it. good thing, someone figured it out.
Thank you this worked for me when the known fix didn't.
can they fix this please? people have not been able to log in for days. for me it;s been 8 hours.....
I have the same issue. None of the posted workarounds are working (the Rioter method or the other method of swapping regions).

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/MxAAh0GN-unable-to-log-in-bug-fix-attemptslog

I started an attempted fix and group brianstorm thread.
